Getting Ready
■Prepare wet
wipes.
■Ask a manager
about hygiene
procedures.

Cooking
■Open the platen
and take out the
1/10th patties
from the grill-
side freezer.

Cooking
■Put the patties
on the grill from
front to back,
left to right.

Cooking
■Close the platen
and wipe your
hands with a wet
wipe.

Cooking
■Prepare a UHC tray
with a clean liner.

Cooking
■When the platen
opens, sprinkle
seasoning on the
patties.

Cooking
■Remove patties
from front to
back, and put
them onto the
UHC tray.

Cooking
■Do your part
to prevent
secondary
contamination.

Cooking
■Put them in the
UHC and push the
timer.

Cooking
■Store the patties
so that the
temperature is at
least 60°C/140°F.

Cooking
■After you clean
the grill and push
the standby switch,
wipe your hands
with a wet wipe.
